title: Genie
description: The queen of the sex scene is back. USA Today bestselling author Kitty French returns with a brand new, smokin' hot story to set your kindle on fire. One complete story. No cliffhanger. Hold onto your corset strings, we're going burlesque!  Feathers. Lies. Glitter. Secrets. Lust.  Meet Genie Divine, the wise-cracking London show-girl on a hell-bent mission to save her beloved family theatre.  Now meet Abel Kingdom, the australian gym mogul determined to buy it out from underneath her.  On paper they have nothing in common, and when they meet, they have even less.  The only thing they DO have is chemistry. Undeniable, rip-my-clothes-off-and-do-me-now-against-the-wall chemistry.  He wants her theatre. She wants him dead.  The stage is set for an explosive summerâ€¦
author: Kitty French
